explanations.machine learning: The paper proposes a method to approximate the solution of online mixed-integer optimization problems using machine learning.
explanations.classification: The approach encodes the optimal solution into a strategy, turning the core part of the optimization routine into a multiclass classification problem.
explanations.neural network: The method involves a feedforward neural network evaluation as part of the extremely fast online optimization approach.
explanations.deep learning: The use of a feedforward neural network suggests the application of deep learning techniques in the proposed method.
